start-here: Anthropic, Google, OpenAI, all recommend using XML to structure your LLM prompts. They encourage meaningful title tags and nesting.
instructions: Define the task clearly and specify the desired output format.
context: Provide relevant background information that an AI needs to understand the task.

first-example.input: Sample input that demonstrates the expected format
first-example.output: Expected output showing the desired response format

formatting: Specify how you want the response structured (e.g., bullet points, numbered list, JSON, etc.).
constraints: List any limitations, requirements, or specific guidelines Claude should follow.
